text: goyamin hā govipaḷa satungen bihi kaḷa dæyin allāhṭa koṭasak ven koṭa ovungē kalpitaya anuva meya allāh venuveni, meya tamangē sama devivarun venuveni yæyi pavasati. ovungē sama devivavarun venuven vū dǣ allāh veta ḷan̆gā novanu æta. tavada allāh venuven vū dǣ ovungē sama devivarun veta ḷan̆gā vanu æta. ovun tīndu karana dǣ napuru viya
